typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> TCrossref
source(output(
		dummy_column as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Dummy
Dummy derive({Date Inserted} = currentDate(),
		{Map Date} = toDate(case(1!=1,1)),
		{Last Updated By} = 'M_PRE_DIM_PREMIUM_TYPE',
		{Source Column} = 'TARGET_CODE') ~> DerivedColumn1
TCrossref filter(CODE_TYPE_ID == 802) ~> CodeTypePremiumType
CodeTypePremiumType aggregate(groupBy(TARGET_CODE,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION),
	CODE_TYPE = max(CODE_TYPE_ID)) ~> Deduplicator
